source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_00<tab>Arya seems excited to see you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_00<tab>レヴナンツトールのアリアは、ひどく興奮しているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_01<tab>Arya greets you with even more enthusiasm than usual. According to a letter she recently received, your former mentor has need of your help. Though the missive is light on details, it seems X'rhun would have you join him in the Ala Mhigan Quarter.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_01前回までの冒険録：
赤魔道士アリアは、妖異の女王リリスの魂の憑代に選ばれた存在だった。冒険者とシ・ルン・ティアは、リリスを倒し、囚われたアリアを救い出す。リリスから受け継いだ力が失われ、赤魔法が使えなくなったアリアだが、再度シ・ルン・ティアに弟子入りできるよう、改めて修行に励むのだった。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
アリアの師匠シ・ルン・ティアから、冒険者の力が必要だという手紙が届いた。ギラバニア湖畔地帯のアラミガン・クォーターで「シ・ルン・ティア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_02<tab>Upon meeting with X'rhun, you learn that a band of graverobbers has made off with a blade once belonging to a member of the Crimson Duelists. The thieves have proven difficult to apprehend by nonlethal measures, and he could use an extra pair of hands (or two, thanks to the stubborn Arya) to ensure he has a captive to interrogate. With the situation explained, X'rhun directs you to a rendezvous point on the eastern edge of Bloodhowe.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_02<tab>シ・ルン・ティアのかつての仲間「紅の疾風」の同胞の剣が墓荒らしに持ち去られてしまったらしい。墓荒らしが出没しているというギラバニア湖畔地帯のブラッドハウ墓地の東で「シ・ルン・ティア」と落ち合おう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_03<tab>X'rhun assigns you the role of convincing the graverobbers to walk into a prepared ambush. Venture into Bloodhowe, and locate the thieves in question.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_03<tab>墓荒らしを誘導する役目を任された。ブラッドハウ墓地で「墓荒らし」を探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_04<tab>You find the graverobbers, and manage to persuade them to move towards the east side of Bloodhowe. They do, however, take your advice with one caveat: you are to go along with them. Catch up to the unsavory band where they await you up ahead.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_04<tab>墓荒らしは、東へと向かっていった。ブラッドハウ墓地で「墓荒らし」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_05<tab>With an eye towards “eliminating the competition,” two members of the graverobbing gang remained behind to waylay you─rather unsuccessfully, as it turns out. Continue on to X'rhun Tia's location, and find out how well your own companions' ambush proceeded.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_05<tab>墓荒らしのうち冒険者に襲いかかってきた者たちを倒した。ブラッドハウ墓地の東に戻り「シ・ルン・ティア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_06<tab>You return to find the remaining thieves trussed up and interrogated. If the captives' confession is to be believed, you will find their stash of ill-gotten gains buried somewhere within the expanse of the Royal Hunting Grounds.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_06<tab>墓荒らしたちが埋めた遺品を掘り起こすことになった。ギラバニア湖畔地帯の王の狩場で「シ・ルン・ティア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_07<tab>A soft patch of ground betrays the location of the graverobbers' buried stash. You soon unearth a large box, and confirm that it contains the missing sword, as well as a collection of other plundered mementos. Join the relieved X'rhun in returning the stolen relics to the Tomb of the Errant Sword.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_07<tab>幸い、遺品はすべて無事だったようだ。遺品を戻すために、ギラバニア湖畔地帯のエラントソードの墓で「シ・ルン・ティア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_08<tab>With the keepsakes of the departed back in their rightful place, X'rhun tells the story of his deceased comrade and his custom-made blade. The sword must have a new owner, and, following through on his promise to continue her tutelage, X'rhun offers Arya the hilt. Caught up in the moment, the three of you reaffirm your dedication to the creed of the red.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_08<tab>シ・ルン・ティアは同胞の剣をアリアに託し、彼女をふたたび自身の弟子として迎え入れた。エラントソードの墓で「シ・ルン・ティア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_09<tab>With apologies to Arya and her education, X'rhun states his intention to resume his pilgrimage across Eorzea that he might be in place to battle the incursions of the Empire. He will, however, return to Mor Dhona from time to time to look in on his student. Arya accepts this decision with good grace, and urges you to join her back in Revenant's Toll.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_09<tab>シ・ルン・ティアは、今後はモードゥナに立ち寄って修行に付き合うことを約束し去っていった。レヴナンツトールの「アリア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_10<tab>Now that she has regained a measure of her mastery over red magic, Arya aspires to perfect the use of her newly acquired weapon. It is time you returned to your own adventures, lest you fail to meet the lofty expectations of your fellow mages!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_SEQ_10<tab>アリアは託された剣を使いこなせるよう修行に励むと意気込んでいた。また彼女の成長を楽しみに、「抗う力」として赤魔道士の力を振るっていこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_00<tab>Speak with X'rhun Tia in the Ala Mhigan Quarter.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_00<tab>アラミガン・クォーターのシ・ルン・ティアと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_01<tab>Speak with X'rhun Tia.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_01<tab>シ・ルン・ティアと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_02<tab>Search for the graverobbers at Bloodhowe.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_02<tab>ブラッドハウ墓地で墓荒らしを探す

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the graverobbers.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_03<tab>墓荒らしと話す

target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_04<tab>シ・ルン・ティアと話す

target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_05<tab>王の狩場でシ・ルン・ティアと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_06<tab>Speak with X'rhun Tia at the Tomb of the Errant Sword.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_06<tab>エラントソードの墓でシ・ルン・ティアと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_07<tab>Speak with X'rhun Tia.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_07<tab>シ・ルン・ティアと再度話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_08<tab>Speak with Arya in Revenant's Toll.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_TODO_08<tab>レヴナンツトールのアリアと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I was about to go looking for you! I've had a letter from X'rhun Tia, and he's asked me to pass on a message. Ahem...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_000先輩！　来てくれてよかった……！
私から探しに行こうか、悩んでいたんです。
師匠から、先輩への伝言つきの手紙が届いたんですよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_001<tab>(-Letter from X'rhun Tia-)<var 1A 02 /var>Arya, I hope this missive finds you well. Should you come across <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> in Revenant's Toll, pray send <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to me in the Ala Mhigan Quarter. I have need of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> help.<var 1A 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_001(-シ・ルン・ティアからの手紙-)アリア、)) (( )) 02 /var>に会えたら、
アラミガン・クォーターまで来てほしいと伝えてくれ。
あいつの力が必要なんだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_002<tab>What could be happening in Ala Mhigo, I wonder...? Well, I suppose there's one sure way to find out! Let's go!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_002だそうです……アラミゴで何か起きたんでしょうか。
急いで、「アラミガン・クォーター」へ行きましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_020<tab>Ah, how wonderful to see my two erstwhile students! And not a moment too soon...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_020おお、ふたりとも元気そうだな！
間に合ってよかったぜ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_021<tab>We are glad to see you too, X'rhun, though I gather the situation is not a happy one?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_021私も、会えて嬉しいです。
けど……何があったんですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_022<tab>You gather correctly. You'll recall the brotherhood I was once part of─the Crimson Duelists? Well it seems the keepsakes left behind by my deceased colleagues have run afoul of some enterprising graverobbers.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_022実は……かつてオレが所属していた赤魔道士の一団、
「紅の疾風」の仲間たちの遺品が、盗掘被害に遭ったんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_023<tab>When the Duelists met their end some two decades past, I was too deeply engaged in my own battles to give them the burial they deserved.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_023……20年前、「紅の疾風」が壊滅したとき、
オレは激闘の中、仲間の亡骸も満足に葬ってやれなかった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_024<tab>And so I did what many before me have done─I collected the blades of the dead, and interred them within the Tomb of the Errant Sword.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_024そこで、せめて形見にと、
彼らの剣を回収して、エラントソードの墓に納めたんだが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_025<tab>With Ala Mhigo much settled since the initial reclamation of the city, I judged it time to pay respects to my fallen comrades. That is when I discovered the tomb in disarray, and one of the Duelists' swords missing...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_025アラミゴも、落ち着いてきた頃だろうと、
久方ぶりに墓参りに来てみたら……
そのうちの一振りが、失われていることに気づいたのさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_026<tab>It would seem such petty acts of larceny have become common of late, and although the Resistance speaks of taking steps, the army has its hands full overseeing the restoration efforts.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_026最近、こうした小悪党が都市外にチラホラ出没しているらしい。
アラミゴ解放軍も問題視しているそうだが、
まだ街や集落の復興で手一杯らしくてな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_027<tab>But it's said that unrest and dissent have largely disappeared under General Aldynn's command. Why this sudden rash of law-breaking?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_027でも、アラミゴは、ラウバーンという方の指導のもと、
落ち着きを取り戻しつつあると聞きます。
なのに何故、墓荒らしが出没を……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_028<tab>Ah, well now that the imperials have been beaten back, those who once suckled from the Empire's teat are forced to look elsewhere for the wealth to which they are accustomed. For some, this means taking up a life of banditry.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_028賊の正体は、帝国にすりより甘い蜜を吸っていた連中さ。
帝国が去ったことで、拠り所を失った者たち……。
極一部だが、その中に野盗まがいにまで落ちぶれた奴がいるんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_029<tab>And for the lowest amongst <var 1A 02 /var>them<var 1A 01 /var>, it means ransacking the resting places of their countrymen─a crime I do not intend to leave unpunished.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_029エラントソードの墓は、
故郷に埋葬できなかった者たちの遺品を納める慰霊碑……。
そんな場所を汚した連中を許してはおけねえ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_030<tab>As things stand, however, I have yet to deliver said judgment. This particular gang is uncommonly swift of foot, and I must temper my attacks lest I slay them ere learning the location of their stashed loot.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_030なんとしても捕らえたいんだが……
逃げ足が早いうえに、盗んだ遺品の隠し場所を吐かせるため、
生け捕りにしなくちゃならないのが厄介でな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_031<tab>Thus do I turn to you for assistance. Capturing these thieves alive will be far easier with an extra pair of hands...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_031そこで、かつての愛弟子を頼ったというわけさ。
手を煩わせてすまんが、どうか力を貸してくれ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_032<tab>If it's extra hands you need, then count me in!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_032<tab>あの……師匠、私にも手伝わせてください！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_033<tab>Without red magicks at your beck and call? Nay, 'tis too dangerous for one still relearning her art.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_033だが、お前は、
赤魔法の力をすべて失い、修行をやり直している身……。
実戦復帰は、まだ早いだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_034<tab>I've been practicing against the creatures of Mor Dhona ever since we parted ways. My magicks may not be what they once were, but I can cast the initiate spells well enough, I promise!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_034あれから、モードゥナの魔物相手に実戦を繰り返し、
初歩的な赤魔法なら、また使えるようになりました！
足手まといにはなりません……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_035<tab>The monsters in Mor Dhona are not to be trifled with. That was a risky path to take at this stage of your training.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_035……あの辺りの魔物は、そこそこ手強い。
ずいぶんと無茶な修行をしているな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_036<tab>I took risks, yes, but not foolhardy ones. If I don't push myself to my limits, then I'll never catch up to you or <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_036無茶はしていますけど……無理はしていません！
限界ギリギリの修行をしないと、
ふたりには、いつまでも追いつけないから……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_037<tab>I wager you'll not take no for an answer... <sigh> Very well, but you do not leave my side, understand?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_037駄目だと言っても、聞かなさそうだな……。
ただし、決して俺のそばを離れるなよ？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_038<tab>Yes! Thank you, X'rhun─you won't regret this!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_038<tab>はい！　ありがとうございます、師匠！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_039<tab>The three of us, then. Bloodhowe is where these graverobbers ply their unsavory trade, and the edge of the graveyard is where we shall meet.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_039そんじゃ、3人で墓荒らしを追うぞ。
奴らが出没するのは「ブラッドハウ墓地」の辺りだ。
まずは、墓地の外れで落ち合おう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_050<tab>I'm eager to show X'rhun how far my training has come. But more than that, I'm just happy to be at a place where I can assist him again!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_050修行の成果を見せたい気持ちもありますけど……
一番は、師匠の役に立ちたいんです！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_070<tab>I'd like to simply snatch up these graverobbers, but they have proven an infuriatingly slippery foe─a foe who now knows my face.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_070さて、これから墓荒らしを探すわけだが……
これまでの追いかけっこで、オレは面が割れちまっている。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_071<tab>...Which is why you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, must play the role of deceiver.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_071そこで、)) (( )) 02 /var>に、
墓荒らしを、ここまで誘導する役割を頼みたい。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_072<tab>Search the graveyard until you find the thieves in question, then convince them it is in their best interests to slink over here to the east. Once the scoundrels are too close to escape, Arya and I will spring our trap.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_072「ブラッドハウ墓地」で墓荒らしを探して、
ここ、墓地の東側まで誘い出してくれ。
のこのこ現れたところを、オレとアリアでふん縛る。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_080<tab>The graverobbers are lurking somewhere within Bloodhowe. Seek them out and convince them to move eastwards...right into our ambush.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_080墓荒らしどもは「ブラッドハウ墓地」に出没している。
お前は連中を探し出して、墓地の東側まで誘い出してくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_GRAVEROBBER03224_000_090<tab>You lookin' for trouble, mate? How big a fool d'you have to be to just wander up to a gang like this...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_GRAVEROBBER03224_000_090……ん？　何だ、お前。
間の抜けた顔で話しかけてきやがって……。
俺らを捕らえに来たわけじゃなさそうだが……何の用だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_Q1_000_100<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_Q1_000_100<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_A1_000_101<tab>What're you doin' over here? You'll find far richer spoils in the graves to the east!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_A1_000_101<tab>東の方角に金目のものがあったぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_A1_000_102<tab>You should head eastward─I saw a patrol sweepin' the grounds in the west!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_A1_000_102<tab>西の方角で解放軍を見かけたから、今すぐ東に逃げろ

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_GRAVEROBBER03224_000_095<tab>Is that so, eh? We'd about picked this plot clean anyway, so maybe we'll take that advice. Thanks for the hint, <var 1A 02 /var>friend<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_GRAVEROBBER03224_000_095何だと？　それじゃ、急いで調べに行かねえと……！
だが、お前もなかなか……ククッ、いい情報をありがとうよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_GRAVEROBBER03224_000_098<tab>Soldiers, is it? Then we'd best be movin' on. Thanks for the warning, <var 1A 02 /var>friend<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_GRAVEROBBER03224_000_098何だと？　それじゃ、急いで逃げねえと……！
だが、その前に……ククッ、いい情報をありがとうよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_GRAVEROBBER03224_000_100<tab>Oh, and not that we doubt your word or anything, but you'd best come with us. Call it a show of good faith amongst thieves. We'll be waitin' just up ahead...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_GRAVEROBBER03224_000_100お前の情報を信じるぜ……だが、一緒に来てくれよ。
そんな話を持ってくるあたり、お前もカタギじゃないんだろう？
東に進んだ先で、待っているぜ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_GRAVEROBBER03224_000_101<tab>Don't you worry about our two mates─they went ahead to the east, just like you suggested. And us? Well, someone's got to eliminate the competition!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_GRAVEROBBER03224_000_101ククッ、俺たちがここに残ってるのが不思議か……？
残りふたりはお前の話どおり、さらに東へ向かったぜ。
俺たちは……お前の身ぐるみはがすために待ち構えていたのさ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_110<tab>My power is a shadow of what it used to be...which made taking captives easier than expected. Scorch marks rather than incineration!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_110今の私の実力だと、全力でも大したことないので……
特に手加減などしなくても、生け捕りにするのは意外と楽でした。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_130<tab>Nicely done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We caught these two completely off guard.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_130よくやってくれた！
こちらも、生け捕り成功だ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_131<tab>And I must say, Arya, you exceeded my expectations. You've made impressive progress in such a short length of time.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_131アリアも、オレの予想以上に活躍してくれたぜ。
魔法も、この短期間で修得し直した割には大したもんだった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_132<tab>Yes! I knew those lessons at the mage guilds were worth it! Even if it was painful to begin at the beginning again...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_132師匠にそう言ってもらえると、嬉しいです！
幻術士ギルドや呪術士ギルドに足を運んで、
基礎から学んだりもしていたので……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_133<tab>Oho, I see you've been cracking open as many books as you have monsters' skulls. Your dedication to the fundamentals has certainly paid off!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_133魔物相手の荒っぽい修行といい……行動力は抜群だな。
努力の成果、しかと見せてもらったぜ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_134<tab>Now, I counted four brigands the last time I was here. Knowing what I do of such villains, I assume the other two sought to waylay you...?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_134そして、お前もその涼しげな顔……。
墓荒らしに襲われども楽勝だったってところか。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_135<tab>...Yet here you stand with scarce a hair out of place. All jesting aside, I suspect your skills have surpassed my own. What trials must you have endured to forge such strength?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_135冗談抜きで、オレの実力も超えられちまったかもな。
いったいどんな冒険をすりゃ、そこまで上達できるんだ？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_Q1_000_200<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_Q1_000_200<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_A1_000_201<tab>I fought on another star, to save the world from oblivion...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_A1_000_201<tab>こことは違う世界を救うため戦ってきた

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_A1_000_202<tab>I fought on another star, against heroes turned villain...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_A1_000_202<tab>異世界で、英雄の姿をした敵と戦ってきた

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_136<tab>...Another star!? Even your adventures play out on a stage beyond my wildest imaginings.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_136……オレの想像を遥かに超えた答えが返ってきたぜ。
まさか、異世界にまで足を伸ばしていたなんてな！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_137<tab>And this talk of...“sin eaters,” was it? It sounds to me as if your battles took place on the edge of suffering itself, where the heart and steel of even the mightiest red mage would be tested!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_137罪喰いと化したかつての英雄との戦い……。
彼らの悲しい境遇すらも抗い、立ち向かったんだな。
その「抗う力」……お前こそ赤魔道士の鑑だよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_139<tab>Ahem. But whilst it is endlessly gratifying to hear the exploits of one's former student, I suppose we should return to the matter at hand.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_139さて、元師匠としちゃ、
弟子の活躍をいつまでも聞いていたいところだが……
そろそろ、話を墓荒らしの件に戻そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_140<tab>Once we had subdued these ruffians here, a few threats gleaned us the location of their ill-gotten gains─all buried in a box in the Royal Hunting Grounds, or so they claim.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_140連中を尋問したところ、墓からくすねた遺品は、
まとめて「王の狩場」に埋めてあるらしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_141<tab>I believe another division of labor is in order. Arya, pray hand our captives over to the Resistance, then wait for us at the Tomb of the Errant Sword.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_141というわけで、もう一度分担して動くぞ。
アリアは、墓荒らしを解放軍に引き渡してくれ。
エラントソードの墓で落ち合おう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_142<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you and I have some digging to do.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_142オレと)) (( )) 02 /var>は、「王の狩場」だ。
埋められた遺品を掘り起こそうぜ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_150<tab>Go ahead with X'rhun─I have things under control here. When it comes to magecraft, though, I feel like for every three steps I take, you've already taken another ten or twenty!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_150ここは任せて、先輩は「王の狩場」へどうぞ。
それにしても……私が3歩進む間に、
先輩は、10歩も20歩も進んでいるんですね！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_170<tab>Do you feel that? The ground, it's soft─certainly not as packed down as elsewhere. I think we've found their cache.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_170おい、ここ……地面が柔らかくなっている。
盗まれた遺品が埋まっているのかもしれない。
掘り起こしてみようぜ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_175<tab>Phew... Glad I am to have found this before they hauled it off to the black market.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_175<tab>ふう……売りさばかれる前に間に合ってよかったぜ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_176<tab>I cracked the lid to check the contents, and the box is indeed filled with stolen goods...including one rather familiar sword!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_176中身も確認してみたが、
盗まれた遺品は、そっくり入っているようだ。
もちろん、オレの戦友の剣もな！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_177<tab>Come, we should return these articles to the tomb. With any luck, Arya will have arrived already.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_177それじゃ、「エラントソードの墓」に持っていくか。
アリアも向かっている頃だろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_180<tab>Thank goodness, you found the sword! I feared it had been sold...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_180<tab>師匠の仲間の大切な剣……無事で良かったです！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_190<tab>Right! Let us return these relics to their rightful places!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_190<tab>それじゃ、遺品を元の場所に戻していこうぜ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_200<tab>That should be the last of them...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_200<tab>よし……これで、遺品はひととおり納められたな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_201<tab>But what of your comrade's blade?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_201えっ？　でも……師匠の仲間が使っていた剣が、
まだ残っていますよ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_202<tab>Ah, well... Would you indulge me in a moment of nostalgia?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_202ああ……。
ちょいと、思い出話に付き合ってくれるか？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_203<tab>The man who wielded this sword suffered from shallow reserves of aether, and so he commissioned a weapon capable of channeling his energies in the most efficient manner. As you might imagine, the custom blade thus forged cost him a small fortune in coin.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_203この剣の使い手は、先天的に魔力量が人並み以下でな。
効率よく魔力を放出できるよう、特注の剣を作らせたんだ。
当然、値も相当張る代物だった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_204<tab>We would taunt him and his empty purse without mercy, of course, challenging him to become a mage worthy of such priceless steel.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_204有り金はたいたソイツを見て、皆でからかったもんさ。
その高価な剣に見合う男になれよって。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_205<tab>His reply to our jeering comments would always stay with me: “Even should I fail to do this steel justice, it will remain long after I have perished. A kindred soul shall take up the sword, and then you will see my coin was wisely spent.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_205その軽口に、ヤツはこう答えた。
「俺じゃ扱いきれないかもしれないが、俺が死んでも剣は残る。
　残った剣は、おなじ志を持つ者が引き継げばいい」と……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_206<tab>His hopes for such a legacy died with the Crimson Duelists. I entombed the blade, believing that no new mage would rise to claim it...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_206結局、その後「紅の疾風」は壊滅。
オレはもう志を継ぐ者など現れないと、剣を埋葬した……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_207<tab>But I was wrong. You two stand here as living proof that our efforts to revive red magic were not in vain.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_207だが、実際は違った。
「紅の疾風」の志を継いだ者たちが、ここにふたりもいる。
20年前に赤魔法を復活させたのは、無駄じゃなかったんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_208<tab>...'Twas when I discovered the sword missing that I was put in mind again of my comrade's words. And I wonder if he did not orchestrate this affair from beyond the grave if only to remind me of his will.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_208剣の盗難に気づいたとき、その元使い手の言葉を思い出したよ。
こうして、お前たちに頼れる状況で事件が起きたのも、
もしかしたら、ヤツの導きだったのかもな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_209<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you appear to have a distinct taste in weapons. This blade, I think, should belong to Arya...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_209)) (( )) 02 /var>は、
自分の得物には、強いこだわりがあるだろう。
だから、アリア……お前に、この剣を託したい。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_210<tab>B-But I'm not even your student right now. I don't think I deserve to have it...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_210で、でも……私は、今は師匠の弟子ではありません。
そんな私が、受け取ってもいいのでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_211<tab>I made a promise to you, did I not? That once you learn to harness your aether, I would take you under my tutelage once more?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_211おいおい、以前、約束したろ……？
ちゃんと力が使えるようになったら、またオレが教えてやるって。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_212<tab>The way I see it, you have more than upheld your end of the bargain. Accept the sword, Arya. Be my apprentice, and help me usher in a new future for the red.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_212お前は、立派に約束を果たしてみせた。
だから、受け取ってくれないか……我が「弟子」よ。
赤魔法の未来とオレたちの志を継ぐ、赤魔道士として。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say to Arya?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_Q1_000_000<tab>アリアに何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_A1_000_001<tab>You should take the sword.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_A1_000_001<tab>受け取るべきだ

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_A1_000_002<tab>Are you still afraid of the spirits of the dead?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_A1_000_002<tab>でも、アリアは死霊の類が苦手じゃなかった？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_215<tab>...I will. If you would offer to accept me as your student once more, then let this be my answer.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_215……はい。
もう一度、弟子入りを認めてくれたんですもんね。
機会を与えてくれたのなら、しっかりと答えなきゃ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_218<tab>It is not fear that stays my hand! And even should the shade of X'rhun's comrade come forth, I will not flinch from this honor!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_218こ、怖くて戸惑ったわけじゃありません！
それに、師匠の仲間なら化けて出ても……き、きっと大丈夫です！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_220<tab>It is done. Let us present here this day swear a new oath! To fight for the common good with pure heart and unbending steel!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_220よし、今こそ、ここに誓い合おうじゃないか。
今後も、人々のための「抗う力」であろうと！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_230<tab>Look─I've already hung it from my belt. This sword's heavier than my old one, but I mean to practice enough that having it there feels more a comfort than a burden.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_230さっそく身につけてみました……。
今は重く感じるけど、いつかこの重みもなんなく背負える、
一流の赤魔道士になってみせます！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_240<tab>And so concludes our business here. But as much as I should like to accompany you back to Mor Dhona, I fear my own pilgrimage must continue...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_240さて、アラミゴでの用事も済んだ。
本当なら、アリアと一緒にモードゥナへ戻りたいんだが……
すまないな、もう少しひとり旅を続けさせてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_241<tab>This war with the imperials has Ala Mhigo teetering on the brink of uncertainty once more. And I must assume the situation is most taxing for you and your fellow Scions.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_241帝国と開戦したことで、この国はふたたび緊張状態にある。
そんな中、お前や「暁」も、苦境に陥りながらも、
未来を切り開くために戦っているんだろう……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_242<tab>Thus for the time being shall I keep my blade loose in its sheath. I may be but one man, but know that I shall remain vigilant against the Empire's machinations as I chart my course across the lands of Eorzea.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_242オレも微力ながら、後顧の憂いを断てるよう動くつもりだ。
たとえば、帝国がどう動いても守りに駆けつけられるよう、
エオルゼア諸国を警戒して回る、とかな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_243<tab>I am sorry that I cannot yet devote myself to your lessons, Arya─the demands of the road are such that I cannot take you with me and still hope to move as swiftly.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_243というわけで、今は身軽に動けるひとり旅の方が都合がいい。
つきっきりで見てやれなくて悪いが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_244<tab>Your oath takes precedence, of course! I'm ecstatic just to know you'll be my mentor once again. Please, stay safe on your travels!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_244師匠の使命が、大切なことはわかっています！
また修行をつけてもらえるというだけで嬉しいので……
気にせず、旅を続けてください！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_245<tab>I appreciate your understanding. And I will stop by to aid your progress in Revenant's Toll whenever circumstances permit.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_245助かる……。
今後は、合間を縫ってモードゥナへ立ち寄っては、
修行の成果を確認するようにするからな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_246<tab>I take my leave, then. Fare you well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─when next we meet, I expect your scarlet hues shall be ever the more vivid!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_XRHUNTIA_000_246それじゃ……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、次に会うとき、
お前がどこまで大きくなっているか、楽しみにしておくぜ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_247<tab>Shall we make our way back to Mor Dhona, then?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_247<tab>さあ、私たちも「モードゥナ」へ戻りましょうか！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_260<tab>I've been so consumed with restoring my magicks, but now I have a new goal: learning to wield my new sword with perfect execution!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_260失った力を取り戻す……それが、これまでの私の目標でした。
そして、いただいた剣を完璧に使いこなせるようになるのが、
これからの目標です！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_261<tab>With X'rhun's instruction, I mean to become a red mage worthy of his comrade's weapon. And I wouldn't say no to any help from you either, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC015_03224_ARYA_000_261この剣の使い手にふさわしい赤魔道士になれるよう、
師匠の手を借りて修行に励みます。
だから……先輩も、また顔を見せにきてくださいね！
